definition: "speech" or "words" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 149)/see also 言字旁[yan2 zi4 pang2]
to go to class/to attend class/to go to teach a class
to finish class/to get out of class
to make up missed lesson/to reschedule a class
to attend a class/to go to a lecture
to teach as substitute for absent teacher

sentences.english: Sing a song, Revision the target language in lesson 8 .
sentences.chinese: 目的是复习第8课的目标语言，引出新课。

sentences.english: Wasn't it quite tough to get into that course in UCLA?
sentences.chinese: 能进到UCLA学这门课很难吧？

sentences.english: This class can only be taken with the professor's approval.
sentences.chinese: 这个课必须要有教授的许可才可以修。

sentences.english: As she drove home, Mrs. Cox thought about the class she had just left.
sentences.chinese: 科克斯夫人在驱车回家的路上想着她刚上完的这节课。

sentences.english: Readings must be completed before the class number noted.
sentences.chinese: 在每堂课上课前，需读完该课标注中的阅读资料。

sentences.english: Lesson Thirty-seven How could a beautiful girl learn Monkey Boxing?
sentences.chinese: 第三十七课哪儿有漂亮姑娘学猴拳的？

sentences.english: It's the first thing they should teach you after arithmetic, in grade school.
sentences.chinese: 这是你在学校学完基本算术后的紧接着的课。

sentences.english: Learn about the basic steps of the Merengue in this free video dance lesson.
sentences.chinese: 有关这梅伦格学习的基本步骤在此免费视频舞蹈课。

sentences.english: The professor is really hilarious and funny. He makes it very interesting.
sentences.chinese: 教授真的很搞笑很滑稽，他课讲很有意思。

sentences.english: And so, we will see you if I time this correctly on Wednesday.
At 4000m camp, we had the first learning session.
sentences.chinese: 在4000米营地，我们上了第一堂讨论课。

sentences.english: When I watched this lecture, I noticed a slip of the tongue.
sentences.chinese: 当我看这节课的视频，发现了讲错的地方。

sentences.english: This is CS50, Friday of Week 0.
sentences.chinese: 本课程是CS50，第一周周五的课。

sentences.english: This is CS50, the end of Week 2.
sentences.chinese: 这是CS50课程，第二周的最后一次课。

sentences.english: You'll not be happy at the end of class.
sentences.chinese: 你们不会在课结束时幸福。

sentences.english: They're sending all of us to auctioneering class.
sentences.chinese: 他们要送我们全部人去拍卖课。

definition: school begins/give a course/teach a subject
to go to class/to attend class/to go to teach a class
tutorial/period of tuition for one or two students
to attend a class/to go to a lecture
(at a school) to take as an elective/an elective/elective (subject)
